meaning: To cause to burst or collapse inward.
To demolish (a building) by causing to collapse inward.
sentences: How does the ship not just implode or melt?
He felt like he would implode if he didn't get some blood soon.
Conversely, the implode() function builds a string from an array.
But I'd hate for the club to implode just because we got a bit too greedy.
They get heavy use, so they just seem to pack up and slowly go abit bonkers, and then implode.
Like they have every time since 1966, and numerous times before, they'll implode in spectacular fashion when it really matters.
